titles.title: Congratulating Jim Boeheim, head coach of the Syracuse University Orange men's basketball team and a native of Lyons, New York, for receiving many coaching awards for the impressive achievements of the Syracuse University Orange 2009-2010 men's basketball team.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 4/29/2010--Introduced. Congratulates coach Jim Boeheim on being named the recipient of many accolades for the 2009-2010 achievements of the Syracuse University Orange men's basketball team.
